comments:
Trying to create a Report in the Profiling and Logging View causes a Bundle error to be thrown and the report dialog does not open. 

The report generation works in 4.2.1 but produces the error in 4.3 builds
I have extracted the available BIRT plugins for 4.3.

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Open Profiling and Logging Perspective
2. Import an access Log File
3. Open the file in the log view
4. Click the Report button on the Toolbar in the Log View or select the Log > Right Click >Report...

Results:
Nothing happens in the UI.
The Error Log Registers:

This bug shouldn't be blocking 156249.  If you don't install birt with TPTP this problem does not occur.  You can fix 156249 if you don't install birt.
I checked the latest in head and it seems to work.   Check out the latest code.
Reporter: Please verify and close in preparation for shutting down the TPTP 4.4 release.  Thanks.

Closing by default since not verified/closed by the originator in the 6+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the
resolution is not correct.
